Description.Text: Located in Redcliffe Peninsula, Scarborough Beach Resort is a perfect starting point from which to explore Brisbane. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. All the necessary facilities, including Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, meeting facilities, family room, BBQ facilities, are at hand. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find internet access â€“ wireless, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, desk. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa, garden. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Brisbane has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Scarborough Beach Resort.
